author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Special Court for CBI cases here on Monday dismissed the bail pleas moved by S. Durga Prasad, Regional Commissioner (Chennai Region), Employees Provident Fund Organisation and six others who were arrested by the CBI in a corruption case.

The CBI made the arrest on January 18 based on inputs that Mr. Prasad had demanded Rs.25 lakh as bribe for favouring a educational institutions’ group in a case relating to subterfuge of wages paid to employees.
title: Bail plea dismissed
